uniol.apt.ui.impl

Class SimpleParametersParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.ui.impl.SimpleParametersParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParametersParser

    public class SimpleParametersParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParametersParser
    A simple parsers for command-line strings that assumes a single module invocation. It parses command-line string like "some arg_1 ... argn_n" such that getModuleNames() returns ["some_module"] and getModuleArguments(String) for "some_module" returns ["arg_1", ..., "arg_n"]
    Author:
    Renke Grunwald
